content: swinub body round 1 magic_ring 6 6 round 2 increase around 12 round 3 2inc 4sc 2inc 16 round 4 4inc 4sc 4inc 24 round 5 2sc 5inc 7sc 5inc 5sc 34 round 6 6sc increase 16sc increase 10sc 36 round 7-8 single_crochet around 2 rounds 36 round 9 5sc 2dec single_crochet to beg 34 round 10 3sc decrease 2sc decrease single_crochet to beg 32 round 11 2sc decrease single_crochet decrease 2sc single_crochet ch2 slip_stitch to side of single_crochet slip_stitch next st around final slip_stitch next st will be in the 1st stitchof the next round 12 flappy round 12 decrease 2sc decrease 8sc behind little flappysof previous round ex next to flappy behind flappy next to flappy behind flappy 4dec 8sc 24 round 13 decrease around 12 round 14 single_crochet around 12 round 15 decrease around 6 feet chain 2 single_crochet back 1 on the chain chain 2 slip_stitch to side of single_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch back into original single_crochet it will make a little heart shape nose chain 6 slip_stitch to beginning to form circle slip_stitch around 6 slip_stitch to beg tail tiny crochet cord stripes cut a long length of dark brown yarn and make longstraight lines with a yarn needle if durability is a concern you can make each stripeas a chain and slip_stitch back down the chain you can sew each one of those on social media @craftasaurustex patreon com/craftasaurustex
